name: Blast-off
description: Blast-off is a hardcore jumper/runner/shmup, where your alter ego will be a ball of anti-matter seeking to leave our Universe. Anti-matter is extremely difficult to exist in our universe, because when it contact with matter it annihilates.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4600 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 180 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 660Ti DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible
